channel.title: Articles on The Joy of Coding

item.title: The Obligatory Hello World
item.description: Even though its still early days of the Covid outbreak, this lockdown has already changed a lot of things for and around me. So, despite a restless 6 year old at home and some extra bit of household chores, I suddenly find myself with additional leisure time, never seen before. Hence, this is perhaps an opportune moment, to pause and reflect at things gone by, and look forward to, great things yet to come.
